column4: Does anyone have the P6NGM2 (MS-7518) motherboard with the nVidia GeForce 7050/610i chipset.  I am trying to find a manual on the video card to see what resolutions it can support.  Any ideas?
Much appreciated if you can point me to where there is a manual.
Are there manuals available from nvidia's website on graphic cards? I haven't found any
I checked MSI and they didn't have any info on that particular video chipset
what kind of manuals?
check the manufacturer site
I am trying to find a manual on the NVIDIA MCP 73U chipset
hmm nvidia have it as a pdf on the site i believe so
Yeah I'm having trouble finding where they have pdf files on the site
if you can locate the chipset on the site that is
its on the left block somewhere
I haven't had any luck in tracking down that particular chipset
where is this chipset used?
Not sure I understand the question
is this on a motherboard?
I have d/l the motherboard manual, but it does not have much about the chipset so that is why I have been at nvidia's site
This is all the information I have
http://pastebin.com/d35f8275
hmm so what problem do u have wit h it
i think google is showing lots of stuff on it
none of those good?
the problem I have is what I find out the supported resolutions of that chipset since I am looking at upgrading the monitor
so I need to find out what monitors I can buy with that chipset
I can't find the technical specs on that chipset
hmm do you think some monitors wont work with it?
it's possible if I get one with a super high res
so would rather not take my chances
unlikely
its old chipset right?
hmm. but still, nvidia should provide info on the chipset, no?
yeah
sure I can do trial and error, but I know it supports vga and dvi... what I want to know is the max res supported by nvidia geforce 7050/nforce 610i chipset
wait
geforce 7050 basically
yeah, basically
is there a pdf available on the 7050?
interestingly ther isnt any for the 7050
need to report to nvidia this
what do you mean there isn't any? that is odd...
got it
http://www.nvidia.com/object/IO_35712.html
i suggest you go to MSI website, and check it
iam sure it will be there
but where do you find resolution in that?
got it wait
cant find res but what monitor are you talking abbout?
best is manufacturer page but it should support upto 1900 and above easy
yeah that is what I was trying to find
K9NGM3 board?
it has single link DVI support so be careful
Blazing-fast RAMDAC supports display with high, ergonomic refresh rates up to and including 1920x1440@75Hz.
http://www.nvidia.com/object/mobo_gpu_features_benefits.html#gf7nf5
P6NGM2-L
so dont expect 1080p res
its integrated so what u expect
but check with MSI for specifics
where did you find that? I see the 7050
but not the 610i on there
610 is the southbridge for media storage and communications , nothing to do with display
where do you see the res?
its mentioned keep reading
http://www.nvidia.com/object/mobo_gpu_features_benefits.html#gf7nf5
ok I see it now
i prefer gnome xchat its simple and unclettered
is there a way to switch channels without having to use the mouse?
hmm ctn N? BUT
ubuntu-bug -p <packagename_
ubuntu-bug -p <packagename>
ok then its different ,  a casper bug
you need to follow some steps
wait i help you
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/DebuggingCasper
u needa pen drive for it
what are you talking about?
and why is a pen drive required to report a bug?
you wanted to file a bug about the installer?
it boots?
aah sorry never mind
yeah ubuntu 9.10 is installed, just would like to report a bug that I encountered which was during the installer the screen went black
the screensaver should be suppressed
ok sorry
anyways u need the dmesg and casper logs
you have lost me now
any installation related issues are recorded in casper.log
but there was no error... just I want to report that the screensaver should not come on when the installer is running
youll figure it out
does that make sense man?
yeah itsa wishlist then, anyways file  a bug and it will be classified as such
oops sorry too much coffee
so how do you file a wishlit? now that you got me way confused
ok is a bug
wishlist or bug...  or whatever it is lol
yea bug cos screensaver comes on
